item.title: The Upper Bound of Information Diffusion in Code Review
item.description: Authors # Michael Dorner, Daniel Mendez, Krzysztof Wnuk, and Jacek Czerwonka Abstract # Background: Code review, the discussion around a code change among humans, forms a communication network that enables its participants to exchange and spread information.
